summary: Automatic Question Paper Generation System - A web application for teachers to manage question banks and generate academic exam papers with database connectivity
architectural_notes: Navy blue primary color, light blue accents, light grey background - academic professional theme
Poppins/Inter font family for modern professional typography
Database connectivity required for subjects, questions, and paper generation
Question categorization by marks (2m, 4m, 6m, 8m) and MCQ with difficulty levels
PDF generation capability for multiple exam sets (Set A through E)
Responsive grid layout with rounded cards, soft shadows, and minimal icons
Word document (.docx) parsing capability required for bulk question upload
MCQ questions should be 1 mark each
Display popup confirmation messages for successful file uploads and paper generation
Automatically show generated paper preview after successful generation
known_issues: Questions added via bulk upload are not displaying in the Question Bank
Paper generation process is slow or unresponsive
Generated question papers are not displaying after generation completes
No confirmation popup shown when bulk upload file is successfully processed
Generated question papers still not displaying after generation completes in Version 7
Bulk upload file is not uploading - upload process failing completely

existing_features.title: Implement teacher authentication system with Internet Identity integration for login/logout functionality
Create Teacher Login page with college logo placeholder, system title 'Automatic Question Paper Generation System', Internet Identity login button, and forgot password link
Build Dashboard page with welcome message showing teacher name, navigation sidebar with links to Dashboard, Add Questions, Question Bank, Generate Paper, Generated Papers, and Logout
Display statistics cards on Dashboard showing Total Subjects, Total Questions, and Papers Generated with real-time counts from database
Implement database structure visualization on Dashboard showing the workflow: Subjects → Question Categories → Stored Questions → Paper Generation Engine → PDF Output

Build Add Questions page with form containing subject dropdown, question category dropdown, question text area, MCQ options fields (visible only when MCQ is selected), difficulty level dropdown, and Save to Database button with success message popup
Create Question Bank page with ability to view all questions grouped by subject and category, and provide edit and delete functionality for both subjects and questions

Build Generate Question Paper page with form containing subject dropdown, exam duration input, total marks input, and number of questions selector for each category (2 Marks, 4 Marks, MCQ, 6 Marks, 8 Marks), plus Generate Paper button that triggers database-based automatic question selection

Build Generated Question Paper Preview page with formal academic layout including college name header, subject name, time and total marks, questions organized in Section A (MCQ), Section B (2 Marks & 4 Marks), Section C (6 Marks & 8 Marks) with proper numbering, and Download PDF button for each of 5 sets (A, B, C, D, E)
Implement PDF generation functionality that creates downloadable PDFs of generated question papers maintaining formal academic formatting with college header, sections, and proper numbering
Create Generated Papers page that lists all previously generated question papers with details (subject, date, marks) and allows accessing preview and PDF download for each paper

Apply consistent navy blue, light blue, white, and light grey color palette across all pages with Poppins or Inter font, rounded buttons with subtle shadows, soft shadows on cards, and responsive grid layout
Add a bulk upload section to the Add Questions page with a file upload input accepting CSV or JSON format and a bulk upload button

Implement CSV parser on frontend that converts uploaded CSV files into question objects array with columns: subject, category, questionText, options (pipe-separated for MCQ), correctAnswer, difficultyLevel
Implement JSON parser on frontend that validates uploaded JSON files contain an array of question objects matching the Question type structure
Create React Query mutation hook useBulkUploadQuestions that calls the backend addQuestionsInBulk function and invalidates the questions query on success
Display success message popup showing the count of questions successfully uploaded after bulk upload completes
Display validation error messages when bulk upload file contains invalid data, showing specific issues like missing required fields or invalid category values
Add a downloadable CSV template file link on the Add Questions page that provides the correct format with example rows for users to follow
Create a Word document parser utility (frontend/src/utils/docxParser.ts) that extracts questions from .docx files and converts them into question objects matching the Question type structure
Update the bulk upload file input on the Add Questions page to accept Word document format (.docx) in addition to CSV and JSON

Integrate Word document parser into the bulk upload flow in AddQuestion.tsx so that when a .docx file is uploaded, it is parsed using the docxParser utility and processed through the existing useBulkUploadQuestions mutation
Create and provide a downloadable Word document template (.docx) file that demonstrates the required format for bulk question upload, including example questions with all required fields

Fix the Question Bank page to correctly display all questions added via bulk upload by ensuring the useQuestions hook properly fetches and returns all questions from the backend, including those added through addQuestionsInBulk

Optimize the paper generation process in GeneratePaper.tsx to complete within 2-3 seconds by improving the question selection algorithm and reducing unnecessary re-renders during the generation of 5 paper variants
Add error handling and loading states to the bulk upload flow in AddQuestion.tsx to provide clear feedback when upload is in progress, successful, or fails

Debug and fix the PDF generation functionality in frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts to ensure generated question papers display correctly when the Download PDF button is clicked on the Paper Preview page
Verify that the PaperPreview page correctly passes the selected paper variant data to the pdfGenerator utility when Download PDF button is clicked
Add error handling to the PDF generation process in PaperPreview.tsx to display a user-friendly error message if PDF generation fails
Update the MCQ category marking scheme from its current value to 1 mark in the backend Question type definition and throughout the application
Fix the generated paper preview display issue so that generated papers are shown immediately after the generation process completes
Add a success popup notification in AddQuestion.tsx that appears immediately after a file is successfully uploaded via bulk upload, showing confirmation that the file has been processed
Add a success popup notification in GeneratePaper.tsx that appears after question papers are successfully generated, confirming the generation and automatically showing the generated paper preview
Debug the GeneratePaper.tsx component to identify why the paper preview is not displaying after the Generate Paper button is clicked and paper generation completes
Fix the paper preview display flow in GeneratePaper.tsx so that after paper generation completes successfully, the generated paper preview is immediately shown to the user
Verify that generated paper data is correctly saved to localStorage in GeneratePaper.tsx before attempting to navigate to the preview
Ensure the PaperPreview.tsx component correctly loads and displays paper data from localStorage when navigated to from GeneratePaper.tsx
Add console logging or error boundary handling in GeneratePaper.tsx to capture any runtime errors that occur during paper generation or navigation
Debug the GeneratePaper.tsx component to identify why the navigation to PaperPreview page is failing after successful paper generation and localStorage save
Fix the router navigation in GeneratePaper.tsx to ensure successful transition to the PaperPreview page after paper generation completes and data is saved to localStorage
Add comprehensive error logging in GeneratePaper.tsx for the entire paper generation flow including question fetching, validation, shuffling, localStorage save, and navigation steps
Verify that the PaperPreview.tsx component properly handles the case when navigated to directly after generation, ensuring it correctly reads from localStorage and renders the paper data
Debug the useQuestions React Query hook in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts to identify why questions are not being fetched from the backend getQuestions function
Add error handling and loading states to the QuestionBank.tsx component to display meaningful messages when questions fail to load or are still loading
Verify that the useActor hook properly invalidates and refetches the questions query when the backend actor changes or reconnects
Add comprehensive error logging to the GeneratePaper.tsx component to identify why questions are not loading during paper generation
Debug and fix the file upload mechanism in AddQuestion.tsx to identify why uploaded files (CSV, JSON, DOCX) are not being processed when the bulk upload button is clicked
Add comprehensive error handling to the file upload process in AddQuestion.tsx to catch and display errors during file reading, parsing, and the useBulkUploadQuestions mutation
Verify that the file input element in AddQuestion.tsx has the correct accept attribute and onChange handler to capture file selection events
Add loading indicator and disabled state to the bulk upload button in AddQuestion.tsx during file processing to prevent multiple simultaneous uploads

new_feature_requests.summary: Teacher login page with email/username, password, forgot password link, and academic branding
Dashboard with navigation sidebar, welcome message, and statistics cards (total subjects, questions, papers generated)
Add Questions page with database-connected form: subject dropdown, question category (2m/4m/MCQ/6m/8m), question text, MCQ options, difficulty level, save functionality
Generate Question Paper page with subject selection, exam duration, total marks, category-wise question count selection, and automatic database-based paper generation
Generated Paper Preview with formal academic layout, sectioned questions (A: MCQ, B: 2m/4m, C: 6m/8m), PDF download, and 5 different sets (A-E)
Question Bank page with ability to view, edit, add, and delete subjects and questions
Database structure visualization in dashboard showing workflow: Subjects → Categories → Questions → Generation → PDF
Engineering subjects support including Discrete Mathematics, Operating System, Microprocessor, etc. with ability to add/modify subjects
Create backend data model for Subjects with fields: id, name, code, and ability to add, edit, and delete subjects

Create backend data model for Questions with fields: id, subjectId, category (2 Marks, 4 Marks, MCQ, 6 Marks, 8 Marks), questionText, options (array for MCQ), correctAnswer (for MCQ), difficultyLevel (Easy, Medium, Hard), and timestamp

Create backend data model for GeneratedPapers with fields: id, subjectId, subjectName, examDuration, totalMarks, questions (array of question IDs grouped by section), setVariants (5 variants: A, B, C, D, E with shuffled question order), createdAt, and teacherId
Bulk question upload functionality to add multiple questions at once
Create backend function addQuestionsInBulk that accepts an array of question objects and adds them all to the questions map, returning the count of successfully added questions
Accept multiple questions at a time in Word (.docx) format for bulk upload
Install and configure a Word document (.docx) parsing library (such as mammoth or docx) in the frontend to extract text content from uploaded .docx files
Ensure the backend getQuestions function returns all questions stored in the questions map, and verify that the addQuestionsInBulk function properly stores all questions with unique IDs
Change MCQ category to 1 mark instead of current marking scheme
Display generated paper preview immediately after paper generation with popup confirmation
Show popup confirmation message when file is successfully uploaded during bulk upload
Fix the backend getQuestions function in backend/main.mo to ensure it correctly returns all questions stored in the questions map as an array
